column1: Commercial international flights may not re-open until Oct, according to Peruvian Minister of Transport recent statementhttps:/â€¦

And October is tentative and may not be for all countries. They mentioned that flights to/from a country will depend on the situation in that country. They are also looking at measures to be implemented for travelers such as testing and quarantine.Edited: 11:29 am, May 17, 2020
